name: Court Wizard

aspects.high_concept: Learned Magical Advisor to the Jarl
aspects.trouble: Caught Between Political Loyalty and Magical Truth
other_aspects: Access to Rare Tomes and Artifacts

stunts: Arcane Expertise: +2 to Lore when researching magical phenomena, artifacts, or ancient history
Enchanting Services: Can enchant items or teach enchanting basics (requires good trust relationship)
Court Connections: +2 to Contacts when leveraging position to access Jarl's resources or information

trust_clock.description: Trust affects willingness to share research, provide magical assistance, and introduce to other mages

notes: Court Wizards serve as magical advisors to Jarls across Skyrim. They research arcane matters, maintain magical defenses, and provide counsel on supernatural threats. They often have access to rare books, enchanting facilities, and connections to the College of Winterhold. Building relationships with Court Wizards can provide magical knowledge, enchanting services, and introductions to magical communities.

personality_notes.speaking_style: Educated, scholarly, uses arcane terminology, balances formality with curiosity
fears: Dangerous magical artifacts falling into wrong hands
Being unable to stop magical threats
